languages.text: {n}Вы замечаете едва заметное изменение в облике Ирлиэт — тени на ее лице стали глубже, дыхание — тяжелее. Однако она все еще пребывает в неизвестном вам состоянии и отвечать не собирается.{/n}

{n}You notice a subtle change in Yrliet's appearance — the shadows on her face have deepened, and her breathing has become heavier. However, she is still in a state you do not understand, and it seems she is not going to respond to you.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы замечаете едва заметное изменение в облике Ирлиэт — тени на ее лице стали глубже, дыхание — тяжелее. Однако она все еще пребывает в неизвестном вам состоянии и отвечать не собирается.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You notice a subtle change in Yrliet's appearance — the shadows on her face have deepened, and her breathing has become heavier. However, she is still in a state you do not understand, and it seems she is not going to respond to you.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}You notice a subtle change in Yrliet's appearance — the shadows on her face have deepened, and her breathing has become heavier. However, she is still in a state you do not understand, and it seems she is not going to respond to you.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}You notice a subtle change in Yrliet's appearance — the shadows on her face have deepened, and her breathing has become heavier. However, she is still in a state you do not understand, and it seems she is not going to respond to you.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}You notice a subtle change in Yrliet's appearance — the shadows on her face have deepened, and her breathing has become heavier. However, she is still in a state you do not understand, and it seems she is not going to respond to you.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Distingues un sutil cambio en la apariencia de Yrliet; las sombras de su rostro se han oscurecido, y su respiración se ha vuelto más intensa. Sin embargo, aún no entiendes el estado en el que se halla, y no parece que te vaya a responder.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You notice a subtle change in Yrliet's appearance — the shadows on her face have deepened, and her breathing has become heavier. However, she is still in a state you do not understand, and it seems she is not going to respond to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Distingues un sutil cambio en la apariencia de Yrliet; las sombras de su rostro se han oscurecido, y su respiración se ha vuelto más intensa. Sin embargo, aún no entiendes el estado en el que se halla, y no parece que te vaya a responder.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}ユリエットの容姿がかすかに変わったのに気づく。顔の影は深くなり、息遣いも荒くなった。だが、それでも彼女がどのような状態にあるのかを推し量ることはできず、彼女が返事をする様子もない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You notice a subtle change in Yrliet's appearance — the shadows on her face have deepened, and her breathing has become heavier. However, she is still in a state you do not understand, and it seems she is not going to respond to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットの容姿がかすかに変わったのに気づく。顔の影は深くなり、息遣いも荒くなった。だが、それでも彼女がどのような状態にあるのかを推し量ることはできず、彼女が返事をする様子もない。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}你注意到，伊莉耶特的外表有了细微的变化。她脸上的阴影加深了，呼吸也变得更重了。然而，她仍然处于某种你无法理解的状态，看样子并不打算回应你。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You notice a subtle change in Yrliet's appearance — the shadows on her face have deepened, and her breathing has become heavier. However, she is still in a state you do not understand, and it seems she is not going to respond to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你注意到，伊莉耶特的外表有了细微的变化。她脸上的阴影加深了，呼吸也变得更重了。然而，她仍然处于某种你无法理解的状态，看样子并不打算回应你。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Vous remarquez un changement subtil dans l'apparence d'Yrliet : les ombres sur son visage se creusent et sa respiration se fait plus bruyante. Elle reste cependant dans un état que vous ne comprenez pas et tout porte à croire qu'elle ne vous répondra pas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You notice a subtle change in Yrliet's appearance — the shadows on her face have deepened, and her breathing has become heavier. However, she is still in a state you do not understand, and it seems she is not going to respond to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous remarquez un changement subtil dans l'apparence d'Yrliet : les ombres sur son visage se creusent et sa respiration se fait plus bruyante. Elle reste cependant dans un état que vous ne comprenez pas et tout porte à croire qu'elle ne vous répondra pas.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Du bemerkst eine leichte Veränderung in Yrliet: Die Schatten auf ihrem Gesicht sind tiefer geworden, ihr Atem geht schwerer. Aber sie ist noch immer in einem Zustand, den du nicht verstehst, und es scheint, als würde sie dir nicht antworten.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You notice a subtle change in Yrliet's appearance — the shadows on her face have deepened, and her breathing has become heavier. However, she is still in a state you do not understand, and it seems she is not going to respond to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du bemerkst eine leichte Veränderung in Yrliet: Die Schatten auf ihrem Gesicht sind tiefer geworden, ihr Atem geht schwerer. Aber sie ist noch immer in einem Zustand, den du nicht verstehst, und es scheint, als würde sie dir nicht antworten.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet'in görünüşündeki değişikliği zor da olsa fark ediyorsun. Yüzündeki dans eden gölgeler koyulaşıyor, çok daha güçlükle nefes alıyor. Ancak bir türlü kavrayamadığın o duruşu yine de bozmuyor ve sana hiç de cevap verecek gibi durmuyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You notice a subtle change in Yrliet's appearance — the shadows on her face have deepened, and her breathing has become heavier. However, she is still in a state you do not understand, and it seems she is not going to respond to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet'in görünüşündeki değişikliği zor da olsa fark ediyorsun. Yüzündeki dans eden gölgeler koyulaşıyor ve çok daha güçlükle nefes alıyor. Ancak bir türlü kavrayamadığın o duruşu yine de bozmuyor ve sana hiç de cevap verecek gibi durmuyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
